amendment.description: To require a certification that Iran's leaders have publically accepted Israel's right to exist as a Jewish state.

action.text: SA 1198 fell when SA 1197 ruled non-germane by the chair.

Amendment SA 1198 proposed by Senator Cotton for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 1197. (consideration: CR S2549; text: CR S2549) To require a certification that Iran's leaders have publically accepted Israel's right to exist as a Jewish state.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1198 proposed by Senator Cotton for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 1197.
